item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load

item.title: Open Reach unique reference OGEAA2317654, 19th December
item.description:
There are 3 residents in Bertie Road SE26 5LW who want to have fibre optic cable installed and we have been told that BT OpenReach have applied to you for a wayleave to carry out this work. The road is unadopted but is maintained by Bromley Council and leads to the rear entrance of Alexander Junior School. My telephone number is 07904093065. could i please speak to someone about this matter. Many thanks Arthur Skinner
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bertie Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 19th December
item.description:
Litter bin overflowing and surrounded by approx 9 or 10 bags of rubbish and rubbish strewn along the grass verges. Public footpath between Sandringham Road and Rangefield Road, at the Rangefield Road entry/exit. This was not there on Wednesday 27th December am.

item.title: Filthy mattress abandoned on Street, 19th December
item.description:
Yet again, fly tipping on this corner it is continuous. I suggest that you look at the landlords around here that are selling up and the students or whoever have been living in this houses could possibly be something to do with this constant abandoning of household stuff. Maybe look into this Lewisham.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alloa Road, New Cross Gate, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox, 19th December
item.description:
A dead fox has been placed next to the bins after they were collected. Unsure what time this occurred. Was not in situ yesterday circa midnight - this morning at 07:00 fox spotted after green general waste collection. 3 Yalding Road SE163SS

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Yalding Road, Bermondsey, Greater London

item.title: Rubbish in street, 19th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kimberley Road, Greater London

item.description:
